name: AstroVerse
description: AstroVerse is a blockchain-based arcade ecosystem built around Telegram mini-games that combine casual gameplay with tokenized rewards. It connects multiple titles—starting with AstroDash—through a unified points and leaderboard system powered by the $ASTRO token. Players earn points through skill-based challenges that can be converted into tokens or used for upgrades, skins, and event participation. The platform’s goal is to simplify Web3 access by offering quick-play games without complex wallet setups, turning entertainment into a seamless introduction to decentralized ownership and digital rewards.
